meanings.sent1: The jangly doorbell startled the cat.
meanings.sent2: The jangly guitar chords filled the room with noise.
meanings.sent3: The jangly alarm clock refused to stop ringing.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded like a jangly tambourine in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The jangly keys clattered against each other as he ran.

meanings.sent1: She felt jangly before her big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The jangly feeling in his stomach wouldn't go away.
meanings.sent3: His jangly behavior made everyone around him anxious.
meanings.sent4: The jangly energy in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The jangly nerves kept her up all night before the test.

meanings.definition: Full of jangles or jingling sounds
meanings.sent1: The jangly wind chimes sang in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The jangly coins in his pocket clinked as he walked.
meanings.sent3: The jangly bells on the cat's collar announced her arrival.
meanings.sent4: The jangly sleigh bells signaled the start of the parade.
meanings.sent5: The jangly tambourine added a festive touch to the music.
